name: Infinite Root
description:
Game developed for Global Game Jam 2023.

Infinite Root is a game that follows the birth of a seedling, which through the search for nutrients will try to grow in a nature that is as rigid as it is fair. The player will control the proliferation of roots that the seedling will use to obtain nourishment, and will use the tools given to it by nature to make its way towards the depths of the soil.

CREDITS :
